examples.example: 宝宝可爱的模样让人忍不住亲吻他的小脸蛋。

translate.english: The cute appearance of the baby makes people unable to resist kissing his little face.

examples.example: 恋人在夕阳下甜蜜地亲吻，那画面美好得让人陶醉。

translate.english: The lovers sweetly kiss under the setting sun, and that picture is so beautiful that it makes people intoxicated.

examples.example: 当比赛取得胜利时，队员们激动地拥抱并亲吻彼此。

translate.english: When the game is won, the team members excitedly hug and kiss each other.
